languages.text: "Что? Нет, я так не думаю. Впрочем..." {n}Ирлиэт склоняет голову и с сомнением осматривает вас с головы до ног.{/n} "Быть может у тебя, элантах, и хватило бы на это внутренних сил. Однако медитация требует долгих практик, сдержанности и самодисциплины. А главное — умелого проводника, что сможет направить твой разум".

"What? No, I do not think so. But then again..." {n}Yrliet tilts her head and sceptically examines you from head to toe.{/n} "Perhaps you, elantach, might have the inner strength to do so, but meditation requires long practice sessions, restraint, and self-discipline. And most important of all — a skilled guide to direct your mind."
languages.original_text: "Что? Нет, я так не думаю. Впрочем..." {n}Ирлиэт склоняет голову и с сомнением осматривает вас с головы до ног.{/n} "Быть может у тебя, элантах, и хватило бы на это внутренних сил. Однако медитация требует долгих практик, сдержанности и самодисциплины. А главное — умелого проводника, что сможет направить твой разум".

But then again..." {n}Yrliet tilts her head and sceptically examines you from head to toe.{/n} "Perhaps you, elantach, might have the inner strength to do so, but meditation requires long practice sessions, restraint, and self-discipline. And most important of all — a skilled guide to direct your mind."

But then again..." {n}Yrliet tilts her head and sceptically examines you from head to toe.{/n} "Perhaps you, elantach, might have the inner strength to do so, but meditation requires long practice sessions, restraint, and self-discipline. traits.locale_text: "What? No, I do not think so. But then again..." {n}Yrliet tilts her head and sceptically examines you from head to toe.{/n} "Perhaps you, elantach, might have the inner strength to do so, but meditation requires long practice sessions, restraint, and self-discipline. And most important of all — a skilled guide to direct your mind."

languages.text: «¿Qué? No, no lo creo posible. Por otro lado...». {n}Yrliet ladea la cabeza y te examina de pies a cabeza con escepticismo.{/n} «Tal vez tú, elantach, poseas la fuerza interior necesaria para conseguirlo, pero la meditación requiere largas sesiones de práctica, autocontrol y disciplina. Y lo más importante de todo: alguien con experiencia que guíe tu mente».
languages.original_text: "What? No, I do not think so. But then again..." {n}Yrliet tilts her head and sceptically examines you from head to toe.{/n} "Perhaps you, elantach, might have the inner strength to do so, but meditation requires long practice sessions, restraint, and self-discipline. And most important of all — a skilled guide to direct your mind."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué? No, no lo creo posible. Por otro lado...». {n}Yrliet ladea la cabeza y te examina de pies a cabeza con escepticismo.{/n} «Tal vez tú, elantach, poseas la fuerza interior necesaria para conseguirlo, pero la meditación requiere largas sesiones de práctica, autocontrol y disciplina. Y lo más importante de todo: alguien con experiencia que guíe tu mente».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「何？いや、それは無理だと思う。しかし…」{n}ユリエットは首をかしげて、こちらを頭のてっぺんからつま先まで観察した。{/n}「エランタ、お前ならその精神力があるかもしれないが…瞑想するには長い時間をかけて訓練し、多大なる自制心と自己鍛錬力が必要だ。何より、お前の精神を導く熟練の指導者が必要だ」
languages.original_text: "What? No, I do not think so. But then again..." {n}Yrliet tilts her head and sceptically examines you from head to toe.{/n} "Perhaps you, elantach, might have the inner strength to do so, but meditation requires long practice sessions, restraint, and self-discipline. And most important of all — a skilled guide to direct your mind."

traits.locale_text: 「何？いや、それは無理だと思う。しかし…」{n}ユリエットは首をかしげて、こちらを頭のてっぺんからつま先まで観察した。{/n}「エランタ、お前ならその精神力があるかもしれないが…瞑想するには長い時間をかけて訓練し、多大なる自制心と自己鍛錬力が必要だ。何より、お前の精神を導く熟練の指導者が必要だ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “什么？不，我觉得恐怕不行。不过，话说回来……”{n}伊莉耶特歪过头，以怀疑的目光从头到脚打量着你。{/n}“或许你内心的力量可以帮助你掌握冥想，外界人。冥想需要长时间的练习、克制和自律，但最重要的是需要一位经验丰富的向导，指引你的心灵。”
languages.original_text: "What? No, I do not think so. But then again..." {n}Yrliet tilts her head and sceptically examines you from head to toe.{/n} "Perhaps you, elantach, might have the inner strength to do so, but meditation requires long practice sessions, restraint, and self-discipline. And most important of all — a skilled guide to direct your mind."

traits.locale_text: “什么？不，我觉得恐怕不行。不过，话说回来……”{n}伊莉耶特歪过头，以怀疑的目光从头到脚打量着你。{/n}“或许你内心的力量可以帮助你掌握冥想，外界人。冥想需要长时间的练习、克制和自律，但最重要的是需要一位经验丰富的向导，指引你的心灵。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Comment ? Non, je ne crois pas. Enfin... » {n}Yrliet penche la tête sur le côté et vous examine de la tête aux pieds d'un air dubitatif.{/n} « Vous avez peut-être la force intérieure requise, elantach, mais la méditation nécessite de longues séances d'entraînement, de la retenue et une grande discipline personnelle. Et plus important encore, un guide expérimenté pour accompagner votre esprit sur la bonne voie. »
languages.original_text: "What? No, I do not think so. But then again..." {n}Yrliet tilts her head and sceptically examines you from head to toe.{/n} "Perhaps you, elantach, might have the inner strength to do so, but meditation requires long practice sessions, restraint, and self-discipline. And most important of all — a skilled guide to direct your mind."

traits.locale_text: « Comment ? Non, je ne crois pas. Enfin... » {n}Yrliet penche la tête sur le côté et vous examine de la tête aux pieds d'un air dubitatif.{/n} « Vous avez peut-être la force intérieure requise, elantach, mais la méditation nécessite de longues séances d'entraînement, de la retenue et une grande discipline personnelle. Et plus important encore, un guide expérimenté pour accompagner votre esprit sur la bonne voie. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Was? Nein, ich glaube nicht. Andererseits ..." {n}Yrliet legt den Kopf schief und mustert dich skeptisch von Kopf bis Fuß.{/n} "Vielleicht habt Ihr die innere Stärke dazu, Elantach. Doch Meditation erfordert lange Übungssitzungen, Zurückhaltung und Selbstbeherrschung. Und vor allem — einen fähigen Führer, der Euren Verstand leitet."
languages.original_text: "What? No, I do not think so. But then again..." {n}Yrliet tilts her head and sceptically examines you from head to toe.{/n} "Perhaps you, elantach, might have the inner strength to do so, but meditation requires long practice sessions, restraint, and self-discipline. And most important of all — a skilled guide to direct your mind."

traits.locale_text: "Was? Nein, ich glaube nicht. Andererseits ..." {n}Yrliet legt den Kopf schief und mustert dich skeptisch von Kopf bis Fuß.{/n} "Vielleicht habt Ihr die innere Stärke dazu, Elantach. Doch Meditation erfordert lange Übungssitzungen, Zurückhaltung und Selbstbeherrschung. Und vor allem — einen fähigen Führer, der Euren Verstand leitet."

languages.original_text: "What? No, I do not think so. But then again..." {n}Yrliet tilts her head and sceptically examines you from head to toe.{/n} "Perhaps you, elantach, might have the inner strength to do so, but meditation requires long practice sessions, restraint, and self-discipline. And most important of all — a skilled guide to direct your mind."

languages.text: "Ne? Hayır, hiç sanmıyorum. Gerçi düşündüm de..." {n}Yrliet, başını eğerek seni kuşku içinde tepeden tırnağa inceliyor.{/n} "Elantach, belki senin içinde bunu yapabilecek bir güç saklıdır. Ancak meditasyon için denemeye uzun zaman ayırmak, kendini dizginlemek ve şahsi disiplin gerekir. En önemlisiyse zihnine yol gösterecek, yetenekli bir rehberdir."
languages.original_text: "What? No, I do not think so. But then again..." {n}Yrliet tilts her head and sceptically examines you from head to toe.{/n} "Perhaps you, elantach, might have the inner strength to do so, but meditation requires long practice sessions, restraint, and self-discipline. And most important of all — a skilled guide to direct your mind."

traits.locale_text: "Ne? Hayır, hiç sanmıyorum. Gerçi düşündüm de..." {n}Yrliet başını eğerek seni kuşku içinde tepeden tırnağa inceliyor.{/n} "Elantach, belki senin içinde bunu yapabilecek bir güç gizlidir. Ancak meditasyon için teamüle uzun zaman ayırmak, kendini dizginlemek ve şahsi disiplin gerekir. En önemlisiyse zihnine yol gösterecek, yetenekli bir rehberdir."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
